kun reading compounds: 檜【ひのき】hinoki cypress (Chamaecyparis obtusa), Japanese cypress
檜舞台【ひのきぶたい】stage made of Japanese cypress (in noh, kabuki, etc.), the limelight, the big stage, the big time
檜【ひのき】hinoki cypress (Chamaecyparis obtusa), Japanese cypress
檜扇【ひおうぎ】formal folding fan made of hinoki cypress, blackberry lily (Belamcanda Chinensis), leopard lily, leopard flower
